headline: 5 Leadership Basics to Inspire Others with Gigi Schweikert
author: SIM Radio Network
sentences: Those “Limitless Leaders” podcasts will be available this week at Eulerity.com as well as on Apple and Spotify.
We had a great time last week at IFA 2022 interviewing Franchisors about what makes a remarkable leader.
Gigi shares 5 basic ways to inspire others to be more than they ever could have imagined themselves.
We’re keeping the Leadership topic rolling with author Gigi Schweikert, CEO of Lightbridge Academy.
Thanks to Eulerity, Franchise Expo West, and Exults.
Thanks to everyone who joined us!
